title: Kaia Cafe - Westport
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, American, Organic, Juice bar, Take-out
description: Cafe located with yoga studio, offering 100% organic fresh juices plus smoothies, sandwiches, salads, wraps. Free Wi-Fi. Another location in Greenwich.
venueHours: Mon 6:00am-4:00pm, Tue 6:00am-6:00pm, Wed 6:00am-4:00pm, Thu 6:00am-6:00pm, Fri 6:00am-4:00pm, Sat-Sun 8:00am-4:00pm
